lead_paragraph: Oakland left guard Barry Sims will miss Monday night’s game at Seattle because of an abdominal strain, ending his streak of 68 consecutive starts. Coach Art Shell said yesterday that Corey Hulsey would replace Sims, who was injured Sunday against Pittsburgh.
